content: A very fun deck drafting game. You basically pick two different themes (zombies and pirates), SMASH them together and fight an opponent. The themes usually have card effects that are related. For example, the pirate cards can "sail" to other objectives. The aliens can "beam up" (eg, remove) cards from the table. There are multiple lanes of play with an objective card in each lane. Your goal is to get a point value that lets you obtain the objective card's victory points. You can either be high, middle, or low. Thus, the game focuses on trying to manipulate yours and others scores.
